00029 from Koo.Common import Common
00030 from Koo.Common import Shortcuts
00031 
00032 from Koo.Fields.AbstractFieldWidget import *
00033 from Koo.Fields.AbstractFieldDelegate import *
00034 from Koo.Common.Calendar import *
00035 from PyQt4.QtCore import *
00036 from PyQt4.QtGui import *
00037 from PyQt4.uic import *
00038 
00039 (DateFieldWidgetUi, DateFieldWidgetBase ) = loadUiType( Common.uiPath('calendar.ui') ) 
00040 
00041 class DateFieldWidget(AbstractFieldWidget, DateFieldWidgetUi):
00042         def __init__(self, parent, model, attrs={}):
00043                 AbstractFieldWidget.__init__(self, parent, model, attrs)
00044                 DateFieldWidgetUi.__init__(self)
00045                 self.setupUi(self)
00046 
00047                 # Add shortcut
00048                 self.scSearch = QShortcut( self.uiDate )
00049                 self.scSearch.setKey( Shortcuts.SearchInField )
00050                 self.scSearch.setContext( Qt.WidgetShortcut )
00051                 self.connect( self.scSearch, SIGNAL('activated()'), self.showCalendar )
00052 
00053                 self.connect( self.pushCalendar, SIGNAL( "clicked()" ),self.showCalendar )
00054                 self.dateTime = False
00055                 self.connect( self.uiDate, SIGNAL('editingFinished()'), self.updateValue )
00056                 self.installPopupMenu( self.uiDate )
00057 
00058         def updateValue(self):
00059                 self.modified()
00060                 self.showValue()
00061 
00062         def menuEntries(self):
00063                 return [ (_('Set current date'), self._setCurrentDate, True ) ] 
00064 
00065         def _setCurrentDate( self ):
00066                 self.uiDate.setText( dateToText( QDate.currentDate() ) )
00067 
00068         def colorWidget(self):
00069                 return self.uiDate
00070 
00071         def setReadOnly(self, value):
00072                 self.uiDate.setEnabled( not value )
00073                 self.pushCalendar.setEnabled( not value )
00074 
00075         def value(self):
00076                 date = textToDate( self.uiDate.text() )
00077                 if not date.isValid():
00078                         return False
00079                 return dateToStorage(date)
00080 
00081         def store(self):
00082                 # We've found in account.reconcile model that the date widget
00083                 # is used to show a datetime field. The field is read-only, but when we
00084                 # call store() it's stored without time information and this causes the 
00085                 # record to be marked as modified. So we ensure the field is not stored
00086                 # if it's read-only. We do it in this field only to avoid regressions 
00087                 # with other models of the ERP.
00088                 if self.isReadOnly():
00089                         return
00090                 self.record.setValue(self.name, self.value())
00091 
00092         def clear(self):
00093                 self.uiDate.setText('')
00094         
00095         def showValue(self):
00096                 value = self.record.value(self.name)
00097                 if value:
00098                         self.uiDate.setText( dateToText( storageToDate( value ) ) )
00099                 else:
00100                         self.clear()
00101 
00102         def showCalendar(self):
00103                 popup = PopupCalendarWidget( self.uiDate, self.dateTime )
00104                 self.connect( popup, SIGNAL('selected()'), self.store )
00105 
00106 class DateTimeFieldWidget( DateFieldWidget ):
00107         def __init__(self, parent, model, attrs={}):
00108                 DateFieldWidget.__init__( self, parent, model, attrs=attrs)
00109                 self.dateTime = True
00110 
00111         def menuEntries(self):
00112                 return [ (_('Set current date and time'), self._setCurrentDateTime, True ) ]    
00113 
00114         def _setCurrentDateTime( self ):
00115                 self.uiDate.setText( dateTimeToText( QDateTime.currentDateTime() ) )
00116 
00117         def value(self):
00118                 datetime = textToDateTime( self.uiDate.text() )
00119                 if not datetime.isValid():
00120                         return False
00121                 return  str(dateTimeToStorage( datetime ))
00122         
00123         def clear(self):
00124                 self.uiDate.setText('')
00125 
00126         def showValue(self):
00127                 value = self.record.value(self.name)
00128                 if value:
00129                         self.uiDate.setText( dateTimeToText( storageToDateTime(value) ) )
00130                 else:
00131                         self.clear()

00134 # There are currently no server modules using the time datatype.
00135 class TimeFieldWidget(AbstractFieldWidget):
00136         def __init__(self, parent, model, attrs={}):
00137                 AbstractFieldWidget.__init__(self, parent, model, attrs)
00138                 self.uiTime = QLineEdit( self )
00139                 layout = QHBoxLayout( self )
00140                 layout.setContentsMargins( 0, 0, 0, 0 )
00141                 layout.addWidget( self.uiTime )
00142                 self.installPopupMenu( self.uiTime )
00143                 self.connect( self.uiTime, SIGNAL('editingFinished()'), self.updateValue )
00144 
00145         def updateValue(self):
00146                 self.modified()
00147                 self.showValue()
00148 
00149         def menuEntries( self ):
00150                 return [ (_('Set current time'), self.setCurrentTime, True ) ]
00151 
00152         def setCurrentTime( self ):
00153                 self.uiTime.setText( timeToText( QTime.currentTime() ) )
00154 
00155         def setReadOnly(self, value):
00156                 self.uiTime.setEnabled(not value)
00157 
00158         def colorWidget(self):
00159                 return self.uiTime
00160 
00161         def value(self):
00162                 time = textToTime( self.uiTime.text() )
00163                 if not time.isValid():
00164                         return False
00165                 return timeToStorage( time )
00166 
00167         def store(self):
00168                 self.record.setValue(self.name, self.value())
00169 
00170         def clear(self):
00171                 self.uiTime.clear()
00172 
00173         def showValue(self):
00174                 value = self.record.value(self.name)
00175                 if value:
00176                         self.uiTime.setText( timeToText( storageToTime( value ) ) )
00177                 else:
00178                         self.clear()

00180 class FloatTimeFieldWidget(AbstractFieldWidget):
00181         def __init__(self, parent, model, attrs={}):
00182                 AbstractFieldWidget.__init__(self, parent, model, attrs)
00183                 self.uiTime = QLineEdit( self )
00184                 self.uiTime.setMaxLength( 11 )
00185                 layout = QHBoxLayout( self )
00186                 layout.setContentsMargins( 0, 0, 0, 0 )
00187                 layout.addWidget( self.uiTime )
00188                 self.installPopupMenu( self.uiTime )
00189                 self.connect( self.uiTime, SIGNAL('editingFinished()'), self.updateValue )
00190 
00191         def updateValue(self):
00192                 self.modified()
00193                 self.showValue()
00194 
00195         def menuEntries( self ):
00196                 return [ (_('Set current time'), self.setCurrentTime, True ) ]
00197 
00198         def setCurrentTime( self ):
00199                 self.uiTime.setText( timeToText( QTime.currentTime() ) )
00200 
00201         def setReadOnly(self, value):
00202                 self.uiTime.setEnabled(not value)
00203 
00204         def colorWidget(self):
00205                 return self.uiTime
00206 
00207         def value(self):
00208                 time = textToFloatTime( self.uiTime.text() )
00209                 if not time.isValid():
00210                         return False
00211                 return timeToStorage( time )
00212 
00213         def store(self):
00214                 self.record.setValue(self.name, textToFloatTime(unicode(self.uiTime.text())) )
00215 
00216         def clear(self):
00217                 self.uiTime.setText('00:00')
00218 
00219         def showValue(self):
00220                 value = self.record.value(self.name)
00221                 if value:
00222                         self.uiTime.setText( floatTimeToText( value ) )
00223                 else:
00224                         self.uiTime.setText( '00:00' )
00225 
00226 class DateFieldDelegate( AbstractFieldDelegate ):
00227         def setModelData(self, editor, model, index):
00228                 value = textToDate( editor.text() )
00229                 model.setData( index, QVariant( value ), Qt.EditRole )
00230 
00231 class TimeFieldDelegate( AbstractFieldDelegate ):
00232         def setModelData(self, editor, model, index):
00233                 value = textToTime( editor.text() )
00234                 model.setData( index, QVariant( value ), Qt.EditRole )
00235 
00236 class DateTimeFieldDelegate( AbstractFieldDelegate ):
00237         def setModelData(self, editor, model, index):
00238                 value = textToDateTime( editor.text() )
00239                 model.setData( index, QVariant( value ), Qt.EditRole )
00240 
00241 class FloatTimeFieldDelegate( AbstractFieldDelegate ):
00242         def setModelData(self, editor, model, index):
00243                 value = textToFloatTime( editor.text() )
00244                 value = floatTimeToTime( value )
00245                 model.setData( index, QVariant( value ), Qt.EditRole )
